1984-03-08.lead_paragraph: Savers deposited $6.8 billion more in savings and loan associations during January than they withdrew, producing the biggest net increase in 11 months, the Government said today. At the same time, the Federal Home Loan Bank Board said, institutions closed $10 billion in mortgage loans, a record for the month of January but down from the $14.2 billion record set in December.
